languages.text: {n}Еще секунду дознаватель остается замершим — а затем его глаза стекленеют, лицо перекашивает, а воздух вокруг становится ледяным. Маражай дергается и странно кашляет, его бледное лицо начинает багроветь. Зашатавшийся друкари с бешеным шипением выхватывает клинок...{/n}

{n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Еще секунду дознаватель остается замершим — а затем его глаза стекленеют, лицо перекашивает, а воздух вокруг становится ледяным. Маражай дергается и странно кашляет, его бледное лицо начинает багроветь. Зашатавшийся друкари с бешеным шипением выхватывает клинок...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator stays still for another second, and then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns freezing cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

{n}The Interrogator stays still for another second, and then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns freezing cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

{n}The Interrogator stays still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him goes freezing cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

{n}The Interrogator stays still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him goes freezing cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

{n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

{n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur reste immobile encore un instant, puis ses yeux deviennent vitreux, son visage se déforme et l'air se glace autour de lui. Marazhai tressaille et tousse étrangement, son visage pâle tourne au violacé. Chancelant, il s'empare de son arme...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur reste immobile encore un instant, puis ses yeux deviennent vitreux, son visage se déforme et l'air se glace autour de lui. Marazhai tressaille et tousse étrangement, son visage pâle tourne au violacé. Chancelant, il s'empare de son arme...{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希站在原地，纹丝不动。一秒钟之后，他的眼神变得呆滞，面容扭曲，周围的空气变得冰冷。玛拉斋抽搐起来，发出了古怪的咳嗽声，苍白的脸慢慢变成了紫色。他摇摇晃晃，伸手去拔他的刀……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希又愣住了一秒钟，随后眼神变得呆滞，面容扭曲，他周围的空气变得冰冷。玛拉斋抽搐起来，发出了古怪的咳嗽声，苍白的脸慢慢变成了紫色。他摇摇晃晃，伸手去拔他的刀……{/n}

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターがさらに一瞬静止し、目をどんよりと曇らせて顔をゆがめると、周囲の空気が凍りつくように冷たくなった。マラズハイは痙攣して奇妙な咳をし、その青白い顔が紫色に変わる。彼はよろめき、剣に手を伸ばした…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターがさらに一瞬静止し、目をどんよりと曇らせて顔をゆがめると、周囲の空気が凍りつくように冷たくなった。マラズハイは痙攣して奇妙な咳をし、その青白い顔が紫色に変わる。彼はよろめき、剣に手を伸ばした…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator bleibt noch kurz still, dann werden ihm die Augen glasig und er verzieht sein Gesicht. Die Luft um ihn herum wird eisig. Marazhai zuckt zusammen und er hüstelt seltsam, sein fahles Gesicht läuft purpurrot an. Er taumelt und greift zu seiner Waffe ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator bleibt noch kurz still, dann werden ihm die Augen glasig und er verzieht sein Gesicht. Die Luft um ihn herum wird eisig. Marazhai zuckt zusammen und er hüstelt seltsam, sein fahles Gesicht läuft purpurrot an. Er taumelt und greift zu seiner Waffe ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}El interrogador se queda quieto un segundo más, luego se le ponen los ojos vidriosos, su rostro se contrae y el aire se torna gélido a su alrededor. Marazhai se estremece y tose de un modo extraño; la palidez de su semblante adquiere un tono purpúreo. Se tambalea y se lleva la mano a la espada...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador se queda quieto un segundo más, luego se le ponen los ojos vidriosos, su rostro se contrae y el aire se torna gélido a su alrededor. Marazhai se estremece y tose de un modo extraño; la palidez de su semblante adquiere un tono purpúreo. Se tambalea y se lleva la mano a la espada...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, bir anlığına donakalıyor. Ardından gözlerine bir donukluk iniyor, yüzünün şekli kaçıyor ve etrafındaki hava buz kesiyor. Marazhai, seğirip acayip bir şekilde öksürüyor; solgun yüzü morarmaya başlıyor. Sendeleyip elini bıçağına götürüyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator remains still for another second, then his eyes glaze over, his face twists, and the air around him turns icy cold. Marazhai twitches and coughs strangely, his pale face turning purple. He staggers and reaches for his blade...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu bir anlığına donakalıyor. Ardından gözlerine bir donukluk iniyor, yüzünün şekli kaçıyor ve etrafındaki hava buz kesiyor. Marazhai seğirip acayip bir şekilde öksürüyor; solgun yüzü morarmaya başlıyor. Sendeleyip elini bıçağına götürüyor...{/n}
